metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21253 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: In multiple locations, there is a possible way to crash multiple systemservices due to resource exhaustion. This could lead to local denial ofservice with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction isnot needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
